subject: Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
Basketball
Brain
organizations: Greenberg Glusker Fields Claman & Machtinger LLP
lead_paragraph: Rochelle Sterling and her lawyer used a clause in the Clippers trust documents to cut her husband, Donald, out of the deal after doctors found him to be affected by cognitive impairment.
snippet: Rochelle Sterling and her lawyer used a clause in the Clippers trust documents to cut her husband, Donald, out of the deal after doctors found him to be affected by cognitive impairment.
